function.description: Performs a web search for any topic and summarizes the results. Web search topics can range from sports, to politics, technology, and any number of other unspecified topics.

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the proofread_query and search_key_words, are derived from

parameter.name: proofread_query
parameter.description: Proofread web search query to be answered and summarized. Grammar, spelling, and all non-salient extraneous language removed.

parameter.name: search_key_words
parameter.description: Key words extracted from the proofread_query to be answered and summarized

parameter.name: information_is_dynamic
parameter.description: Is this a search for information that is dynamic and continually updated on the web (True), or is it static knowledge (False)?

parameter.name: time_frame
parameter.description: What is the timeframe for our web search: today, yesterday, last week, last year etc. Defaults to "None"

function.description: Searches for weather forecasts and summarizes the results.

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the proofread_query and search_key_words, are derived from

parameter.name: proofread_query
parameter.description: Proofread web search query to be answered and summarized. Grammar, spelling, and all non-salient extraneous language removed.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Location for forecast. MUST either be a valid geographic location name or the constant `CURRENT_LOCATION`

parameter.name: start_date
parameter.description: What is the start date for our forecast? Defaults to today, "{date_today}"

parameter.name: end_date
parameter.description: What is the end date for our forecast? Defaults to "{date_after_tomorrow}"

function.description: Searches the memory table to find KNN topics. This is where we store past conversations about any number of topics, including previous web searches. NOTE: This is designed to support the notion of an AI's long-term memory of conversations with humans

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the topic, or topics, are derived from

parameter.name: search_key_words
parameter.description: Key words extracted from the question to be answered and summarized

return-value.name: topics
return-value.description: A list of similar topic strings

function.description: Searches the memory table to find KNN topics by specific date or date range. NOTE: This is designed to support the notion of an AI's long-term memory of conversations with humans

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the topic, or topics, are derived from

parameter.name: search_key_words
parameter.description: Key words extracted from the question to be answered and summarized

parameter.name: start_date
parameter.description: What is the start date of the search?. Defaults to "2024-04-01"

parameter.name: end_date
parameter.description: What is the end date of the search?. Defaults to today, {date_today}

return-value.name: topics
return-value.description: A list of similar topic strings, filtered by date
